DOC.brief_summary: This project investigate whether add nutritional supplement diet beneficial effect development infant brain network ( assess 4 9 month age ) . The nutritional supplement contain lutein ( typically find leafy vegetable ) , docosahexaenoic acid ( DHA ; fatty acid typically find cold-water fish salmon tuna ) , vitamin E .
DOC.brief_title: Investigating Effects Nutrition Maturation Brain Networks Associated With Memory Infants
DOC.detailed_description: This project investigate whether add nutritional supplement diet beneficial effect development infant brain network ( assess 4 9 month age ) . The nutritional supplement contain lutein ( typically find leafy vegetable ) , docosahexaenoic acid ( DHA ; fatty acid typically find cold-water fish salmon tuna ) , vitamin E. This supplement take orally , day 9-10 month start immediately delivery . The investigator also collect dry blood spot ( DBS ) heel infant 4 9 month age ass amount nutrient reach infant ' blood . At age , investigator use Event-Related Optical Signal ( EROS ) non-invasively record brain activity infant passively listen sound ( e.g. , novel sound , speech sound , word , etc . ) watch short video clip move object ( e.g. , toy , child play , etc ) look whether nutritional supplement influence brain development .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion mother time recruitment : 1 . Intention breast feed least first 3 month 2 . 18 year age old 3 . Willingness abstain multivitamins supplement contain lutein vitamin E study take 200 mg DHA . 4 . Normal correctedtonormal vision 5 . Normal correctedtonormal hearing 6 . English dominant language speak home . and/or early termination : 1 . Mother take cholesterol medication and/or medication affect lipid absorption and/or transport . 2 . High risk pregnant mother 3 . Macular Pigment Optical Density ( MPOD ) score great 0.6 . 4 . Preterm birth ( le 37 week ) 5 . Low birth weight ( less 2500 gram , < 5.5 pound ) 6 . Unable unwilling continue breast feeding within first 3 month birth . 7 . Unable unwilling continue take study supplement within first 3 month birth .
